item.title: Invalidate AWS CloudFront Cache
item.description: Today, I needed to invalidate a specific Distribution’s cache on AWS Cloudfront. This resulted in me searching through the awscli tool’s commands and help docs. Luckily I was able to uncover a command to accomplish this task. aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths /\* Simply replace DISTRIBUTION_ID with the proper ID and you will be good to go.
